name: Touch Shift
description:
1. "Touch Shift" is an addictive casual game, which will challenge the coordinate ability between the brain and hands!
2. Simple operation: Anytime and anywhere, you can play it with just fingers tap on the screen!
3. Two Game Modes: Simple mode and Hard mode.
4. The simple model will challenge the coordinate ability between the brain and one hand.
5. The hard mode will challenge the coordinate ability between the brain and two hands.
6. You can accumulate the stars in the game, which can be used to unlock a kinds of exquisite wallpaper.
7. Here, you can choose to compete with players around the world, through the charts show your coordinate ability!
8. Here, you can use a kinds of social networking software to share your achievements and happiness to your relatives and friends!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mudotekgames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mudotekgames
Email: services@mudotek.com
